item.title: 200 years of democracy charted
item.description: The latest version of the Varieties of Democracy (V-Dem) data, version 8, has historical data back to 1789, in addition to updated data for 2017. The full dataset is massive, but at the top level there are a handful of index variables capturing various facets of “democraci-ness”. The chart below shows the polyarchy index for all countries from 1789 to 2017. Click to zoom. You may notice a clump of new countries in 1900.
